title: Establish WiFi connection between PC and E5330Bs-6
answer:
A: Please follow these steps to set up your WLAN

1. Enable your wireless network card and double click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255111001.jpg) icon displayed on windows start bar to open “Choose a wireless network” dialog

2. Select SSID of E5330Bs-6 in the local wireless device list (The WiFi Key and the SSID can be found on a label stick inside the back cover), click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255709002.jpg) to connect.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255121003.jpg)

3.      Input WiFi Key in the dialog of password input then click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255709002.jpg) to establish connection **please pay attention to the case sensitive of WiFi passwords.**

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255530004.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092255766005.jpg)

4.      After the icon of wireless network card turned from ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092256354006.jpg)(status of acquiring IP address ) into ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20140924092256761007.jpg),your PC has established WiFi connection with E5330Bs-6 successfully, enter*<u> http://192.168.8.1</u>* in web browser (ex. IE) to visit Web UI(Double click the web browser and the Web UI will open too).
